metadata.title: CVE-2019-9070 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. It is a heap-based buffer over-read in d_expression_1 in cp-demangle.c after many recursive calls.

notes.note: sbeattie> upstream notes this issue is in libiberty same fix as CVE-2019-9071

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.34-5ubuntu1').
